name: Agent Ninja Space Run 2 - Galaxy Race Dash Crush Multiplayer Edition
name_original: Agent Ninja Space Run 2 - Galaxy Race Dash Crush Multiplayer Edition
description:
The Galaxy awaits you....

Go Ninja Go!! Get ready to Master mid-air tricks at crazy heights! Challenge your friends to a piece of Realtime Multiplayer Ninja Action in this super cool Hi-Speed intergalactic Planet Racer.

Space Surf your Ninja Dude across 25 awesomely unique Planets in a mad race to reach your shuttle and get home. Grab yourself some boosters to speed your journey, learn some fancy surfboard moves, choose from 5 neat cosmic Ninja Characters and Crush your facebook friends in shared screen tournaments.

Your Galaxy Space Race is on and there’s some serious air to be had, have you got what it takes to be a Ninja Agent?

Cool Features:

- Realtime Multiplayer Racing
- Hurtle past your friends and show off your mid-air tricks
- 25 Unique and crazy Planets to speed through
- Grab Boosters for extra Ninja Speed
- 5 Cosmic Ninja Dudes to chose from
- Share on Facebook
- Game Center Enabled Leaderboard

Find Us Online;
